text.paragraph: Do not place on life support

section.title: Doctor Visits / Last Physical or Checkup

item.paragraph: Doctor visit to dermatologist, 60 days before today
Purpose of the visit was to examine 3 facial lesions. Samples taken and biopsied. Biopsy showed no negative findings.
Doctor visit to primary care physician 30 days before today
Purpose of the visit was to receive an annual physical. All normal.
